channel.title: 2006 Flashback-Old school server
channel.description:
2006 remake and have put tons and tons of time and effort into shaping this server into a awesome server. I'm the type of person who likes to add little things to make the server seem even more realistic.
Xp rate is currently x20, once we get forums, there will be a poll to decide if it needs to be changed. Client download:[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/e7xgm2dts6gwtr1/2006Flashback.jar]https://www.dropbox.com/s/e7xgm2dts6gwtr1/2006Flashback.jar[/url] Forums: http://2006flashback.webs.com/apps/forums/ Feedback is appreciated.
Halberds allow you to attack from behind an object. [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/547/65360704.png/][IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/1906/65360704.png[/img][/URL]
D2h full working special attack [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/69/d2h.png/][IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/1294/d2h.png[/img][/URL]
Mostly all working clue scrolls
All skills working but agility, I'm really pushing to get atleast the gnome course added soon.
Have mini quests to get dragon scimitar, dragon dagger\d long, and climbing boots. The d scim and dds\d long mini quest is simply killing the main boss from monkey madness for d scim or tree spirit for dragon dagger\dlong. Now the climbing boots I decided to get more detailed and made it pretty close to the actual quest on real rs. I'm going to be adding mini-quests very soon for unholy\sara\guthix books, rune platebody, and rfd gloves.
Climbing boots mini quest [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/5x4gef/5]Climbing boots mini[/URL]
Transforming Rock crabs [URL=http://tinypic.com/r/5ldx1g/5]Rock crabs[/URL]
Ectophial working [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xzgyw7_ectophial_videogames]ectophial - Video Dailymotion[/url]
Gnome trainers will tell you what to do, keep in mind at the minute I haven't added the course [url=http://tinypic.com/r/5eelnt/5]Gnome trainers]Video - TinyPic - Free Image Hosting, Photo Sharing & Video Hosting[/url]
Bandits attack if you wear saradomin or zammy items. Also just like al-kharid warriors, they will attack if you hit one of their buddies. [url=http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xzgy4h_zammy_videogames#.UYBCTrWTh50]http://www.dailymotion.com/video/xzgy4h_zammy_videogames#.UYBCTrWTh50[/url]
Content
Combat: PvP fully complete PvN fully complete Perfect max hit formulas Perfect accuracy formula Equipment requirements
Magic: Every modern combat spell Can't mage through walls Alching
Range: Bows/arrows Can't shoot through walls Ranged distances
Prayer: [COLOR=green]All bones bury-able Every prayer working properly Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate[/COLOR]
Mining: [COLOR=green]Emptying and refilling rocks All ores can be mined Correct pickaxe finding and animations Prospecting Random chance of obtaining gems [/COLOR] Smithing [COLOR=green]All bars can be made All bars can be forged into items All equipment can be produced Correct animations, interfaces and objects used[/COLOR]
Fishing [COLOR=green]All fish can be caught Big net fishing Correct item requirements Fishing spots located all around the world Correct animations[/COLOR] [COLOR=red]Moving fishing locations[/COLOR]
Cooking: [COLOR=green]Picking wheat Filling flour bin Bread Meat Pizza Cakes Potatoes Eating food (in pieces) Correct animation and timing used[/COLOR]
Woodcutting: [COLOR=green]Stumps and regrowing trees Correct hatchet finding Correct hatchet animations All trees cut-able[/COLOR]
Firemaking [COLOR=green]All logs light able Ashes appear after logs burn out Correct animations Clipped[/COLOR]
Crafting: [COLOR=green]Leather crafting Full tanning Pottery (fired and unfired items) Gem cutting Jewellry making Spinning wheel[/COLOR]
Runecrafting [COLOR=green]All altars working Correct multiple crafting Talismans "pull" to altars Tiaras enchanting [/COLOR] Fletching: [COLOR=green]All logs can be fletched Correct interfaces Fletch 5, 10, x, all Bow stringing Arrow&Bolt making [/COLOR] Thieving: [COLOR=green]Stall Thieving NPC Thieving Correct anims & gfx Correct Respawn Times [/COLOR] Slayer: [COLOR=green]Working slayer gem Working slayer shop All slayer masters[/COLOR]
Farming: [COLOR=green]All farming patch Herbs Tree farming Plant farming Potato farming ect.[/COLOR]
Herblore: [COLOR=green]All potions makeable Itentifying herbs Weapon poisioning[/COLOR]
Music: [COLOR=green]Music updating by region[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Music in all regions Music fades when changing sounds or region [/COLOR]
Minigames: [COLOR=green]Duel Arena[/COLOR] [COLOR=yellow]Fight Caves[/COLOR] [COLOR=green]Barrows[/COLOR]
